thread.title: BRIEF-Lippo China Resources Announces Offer For Shares In TIH By RHB Securities Singapore On Behalf Of Kaiser Union

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Lippo China Resources Announces Offer For Shares In TIH By RHB Securities Singapore On Behalf Of Kaiser Union

organizations.name: rhb securities singapore on behalf of kaiser union

text:
Jan 9 (Reuters) - Lippo China Resources Ltd:
* ANNOUNCES OFFER FOR SHARES IN TIH LIMITED BY RHB SECURITIES SINGAPORE PTE. LTD. FOR AND ON BEHALF OF KAISER UNION LIMITED
* MAXIMUM CONSIDERATION PAYABLE BY LCR GROUP IN RELATION TO OFFER WILL AMOUNT TO APPROXIMATELY S$66.6 MILLION
* KAISER UNION TO OFFER S$0.57 FOR EACH OFFER SHAREâ€‹ FOR ALL ISSUED AND PAID-UP SHARES IN CAPITAL OF TIH LTD Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
